Entries.114780000/f Fisher 1000: shaneTheme/36 22/farmer 40 16 3 Fisher 36 25 2 Wizard -1000 -1000 2/skippable/pause 1000/emote Fisher 44/playSound fishEscape/speak Fisher "她做了什么？她是如何阻挠我的？"/move Fisher -1 0 3/playSound cast/pause 900/emote Fisher 44/playSound fishEscape/pause 500/speak Fisher "我不明白。"/pause 500/speed farmer 2/move farmer -4 0 3/speed farmer 2/move farmer 0 4 2/faceDirection Fisher 1 true/jump Fisher/speak Fisher "哦！你吓到我了。"/emote farmer 8/speak Fisher "不，我不是在钓鱼。我是……嗯……"/pause 600/playSound wand/screenFlash 3/showFrame Wizard 16/warp Wizard 37 24/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 500/screenFlash .35/shake Wizard 500/faceDirection Wizard 0/speak Wizard "没想到会在这里遇见你，@。"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/speak Wizard "我厌恶你对魔法不负责任的滥用，雷明顿。#$b#但议会拒绝取缔你。所以我无法采取行动。"/jump Fisher/speak Fisher "你在搞事情，拉斯莫迪娅。我知道是你。"/emote Fisher 12/faceDirection Wizard 0 true/speak Wizard "我遵循理事会的指示。"/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 500/speak Wizard "我希望你也这样做，雷明顿。"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 0 true/speak Wizard "晚安，@。"/playSound wand/screenFlash 3/warp Wizard -1000 -1000/pause 1000/faceDirection Fisher 0 true/pause 1000/emote Fisher 12/pause 500/speak Fisher "我猜你也好奇那是关于什么的。"/emote farmer 40/speak Fisher "我还能说什么呢？我用魔法来储备我的商店。#$b#拉斯莫迪娅显然不愿苟同。"/emote farmer 8/speak Fisher "你听到她的话了... 我正在做的事情并没有被理事会禁止。#$b#说起来，也许你能找到一些特殊的试剂来帮助我。"/emote farmer 32/speak Fisher "当我弄清我需要什么时，我会让你知道。我会让它值得你花时间。"/pause 800/end

Entries.114780004/f Witch 1000: WizardSong/3 18/farmer 3 23 0 Witch 4 12 2 Wizard 3 13 1/skippable/pause 1000/speak Witch "我爱你，但你是个白痴，拉兹。"/emote farmer 8/speak Wizard "你根本就没听我的故事，姐姐。"/speak Witch "我已经听过你的故事。我也听过她的。就我而言，这是你的孩子..."/jump Witch/pause 500/speak Witch "有人在吗？"/emote farmer 40/move Witch 0 1 2/move Witch 1 0 2/speak Witch "@！见到你真高兴！"/speed Witch 3/move Witch 0 6 2/speed Wizard 3/move Wizard 3 0 1/speed Wizard 3/move Wizard 0 6 2/speak Witch "你认识我的姐姐，拉斯莫迪娅吗？#$b#她并不经常来。现在，你想来看看我的新库存吗？"/fade/end
Entries.114780005/f Witch 1500: WizardSong/3 20/farmer 3 23 0 Witch 3 20 2 Abigail 6 20 3/skippable/pause 1000/faceDirection Witch 1 true/speak Witch "很高兴见到你，阿比盖尔！"/speak Abigail "我想问你..."/faceDirection Abigail 2 true/jump Abigail/jump Witch/faceDirection Witch 2 true/speak Witch "哦，@！你来的正是时候。阿比盖尔和我正在叙旧。"/pause 500/speak Witch "你认识阿比盖尔，对吧？"/emote farmer 40/speak Witch "我正准备给咱们做点心，你为什么不来加入我们呢？"/speed Witch 4/move Witch 0 -2 0/speed Witch 4/move Witch 3 0 1/speed Abigail 3/move Abigail 0 -5 0/speed farmer 3/move farmer 5 0 1/speed Witch 4/move Witch 0 -5 0/playSound wand/pause 1000/speed Abigail 3/move Abigail 3 0 1/speed farmer 3/move farmer 0 -6 0/speed Witch 4/move Witch 4 0 1/move Witch 0 1 2/speed farmer 3/move farmer 2 0 1/addObject 10 15 904 1/speak Abigail "香蕉布丁！你怎么知道这是我最喜欢的？"/speak Witch "我的姐姐... 就是说，我希望你会喜欢，阿比盖尔。#$b#现在请自便，你们两个。然后我给@ 看看我的新库存。"/playSound gulp/pause 500/playSound gulp/pause 500/addCookingRecipe Banana Pudding/playSound reward/message "那太好吃了！艾瑞斯给了我“香蕉布丁”的食谱。"/fade/end

Entries.Witch: 我鼓励我姐姐多出去走走。

Entries.WizardHouse: 我尽量在周日去看望我的弟弟。$1
